description:
The base component for all inputs

```html
<form-field id="text" v-model="submit.formField" label="Form Field Example"/>
```

v-model.comment:
/**
     * What the form-field is binding to
     * @model
     */
v-model.description: What the form-field is binding to

role.description: Role attribute (Could be used for accessibility)

type.description: Input type for the form input

optional.description: Whether or not the field is optional
